room_title: Escape room "Haunted" by Escape on Palafox in Pensacola
review: Had a great time doing this with my friends for my birthday. Even though we didn't escape the Haunted Room, we'll definitely be back!

room_title: Escape room "Haunted" by Escape on Palafox in Pensacola
review: My husband and I treated my daughter, her husband and their 3 teenage children to the Haunted room. It was SO MUCH FUN! It was truly an adventure that brought us together as a family.It was our first visit to Escape On Palafox and as it turned out we picked one of the hardest rooms. Clues provided along the way from the staff really helped us along and kept us from getting frustrated in this challenging room. We laughed and worked together and at times screamed (Haunted room). The laughter and joy gave way to positive family time the rest of the day. We look forward to trying out every room Escape on Palafox has to offer. Highly recommended! We Almost escaped!

room_title: Escape room "Haunted" by Escape on Palafox in Pensacola
review: Had so much fun doing this with my sister, aunt, and cousins! We did the haunted room and made it about 65% of the way through (our estimate) and still had a blast even though we didn't finish.

room_title: Escape room "Haunted" by Escape on Palafox in Pensacola
review: We did the haunted one and it was so so much fun! I definitely want to do the other 2 rooms now. We also did it with 3 women we didn't know and that made it so much more fun. I highly recommend doing the escape room!

room_title: Escape room "Haunted" by Escape on Palafox in Pensacola
review: Last night me and my friends did the haunted room for my birthday celebration. We had such a great time and got out of the room with 24 seconds to spare. We have all decided that we are going to try the other rooms and see if we can escape from them!
